   - LaneChange_AvoidStaticVehicle
   - DynamicInteraction_VRUInLaneCrossing
   - DynamicInteraction_StandardVehicleCutIn
   - StartStop_StartFromMainRoad
   - StartStop_ParkRoadside
   - Intersection_StandardUTurn
   - LaneCruising_Straight
   - else  (ONLY when NO label above matches)

2. CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
   - NEVER force-match ambiguous scenes to predefined labels
   - Use "else" when: 
        • No clear maneuver occurs
        • Action doesn't match ANY label definition

   - For "else" segments: Cover ONLY time periods with NO identifiable maneuver

   <driving_maneuver>action_label</driving_maneuver> from <start_time>XX.X</start_time> to <end_time>YY.Y</end_time> seconds
   • Multiple segments: Separate with " and " in chronological order
   • Time precision: 1 decimal place (e.g., 5.0, 23.5)
   • NO additional text or explanations

4. DEFINITION CLARIFICATIONS:
   - "LaneCruising_Straight": ONLY for uninterrupted straight driving with no interactions
   - "else": Default for idling, complex intersections not covered, unclear scenarios
   - Time segments MUST be contiguous and non-overlapping
   - Minimum segment duration: 1.0 second
